au.org.intersect.exsite9.service
Interface IGroupService

All Known Implementing Classes:
GroupService
public interface IGroupService

A Service for performing actions to Groups.

Method Detail

createNewGroup

Group createNewGroup(java.lang.String groupName)
Creates a new group.

Parameters:
groupName - The name of the new group to created.
parentGroup - The parent of this new group.
Returns:
The newly created Group.

deleteGroup

void deleteGroup(Group groupToDelete)
Deletes a group. Moves all the child groups and files to the provided group's parent.

Parameters:
groupToDelete - The group to delete.

deleteGroupCheck

java.lang.String deleteGroupCheck(Group groupToDelete)
Checks if it is safe to delete a group. Should be called before deleteGroup(Group).

Parameters:
groupToDelete - The group to check.
Returns:
null if the provided group can be safely deleted, or an error message indicating why it cannot be safely deleted.

renameGroup

void renameGroup(Group groupToBeRenamed,
                 java.lang.String NewName)
Renames a group.

Parameters:
groupToBeRenamed - The group to renamed.
NewName - The new group name.

addChildGroup

void addChildGroup(Group parentGroup,
                   Group childGroup)
Adds a group to another group.

Parameters:
parentGroup - The group that will contain the child group.
childGroup - The group that will be added.

performHierarchyMove

java.lang.String performHierarchyMove(java.util.List<HierarchyMoveDTO> moveList)
Moves selected group members to a new group

Parameters:
moveList - The list of items to move
Returns:
null if successful, or a reason why the move was not successful.

                       MetadataCategory metadataCategory,
                       MetadataValue metadataValue,

Associates a metadata category and value to a Group.

Parameters:
group - The group to associate metadata to.
metadataCategory - The category of metadata to associate.
metadataVale - The value of metadata to associate.

                          MetadataCategory metadataCategory,

Diassociates a metadata category and value from a Group.

Parameters:
group - The group to disassociate metadata from.
metadataCategory - The category of metadata to disassociate.
metadataValue - The value of metadata to disassociate.

Determines which groups are associated with a metadata category/value pair.

Parameters:

Obtains a group by its ID.

Parameters:

Returns:

sortResearchFilesInGroup

                              ResearchFileSortField sortField,
                              SortFieldDirection sortDirection)
Configures a group's research files to be sorted by a particular field.

Parameters:
group - The group to configure the sort on.
sortField - The field to sort by.
sortDirection - The direction to sort by.
